DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the best way to feed children after they have a gastrostomy tube placed. The study compares bolus feeding to continuous feeding.
DOC.brief_title: Bolus Versus Continuous Feeding Regimens Post Gastrostomy Tube Placement
DOC.detailed_description: This study will consist of a prospective, randomized comparison of bolus versus continuous enteral feeding protocols in pediatric patients with gastrostomy tubes
DOC.criteria: Less than 18 years of age Admitted for gastrostomy tube placement, with or without Nissen Fundoplication Immunocompromised patients Short Bowel Syndrome (SBS)
